summary: Implement an Internet Identity (II) auth flow where clicking Login/Signup first clears any existing delegation to force a fresh II session (account chooser when applicable), then routes users to Onboarding or Weekly Mountain based on onboarding completion.
architectural_notes: Internet Identity cannot be forced to always show the account chooser; best workaround is to clear local delegation before starting the II auth flow.

new_feature_requests.summary: On Login/Signup with Internet Identity: clear existing delegation first, then start fresh II auth and route to Onboarding (new/incomplete) or Weekly Mountain (completed).
